Introduction

Lee Jae Hyun, better known as Hyunjae, is a South Korean singer and songwriter under ONE HUNDRED. He made his official debut on December 6, 2017, as the lead vocalist, lead dancer, and visual of the eleven-member boy group The Boyz.
